alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lapeer, northeastern Oakland and southeastern Genesee Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 242 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Goodrich, or near Grand Blanc, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Goodrich around 245 PM EDT. Hadley and Ortonville around 255 PM EDT. Metamora around 305 PM EDT. Oxford around 315 PM EDT. Rochester around 340 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Rochester Hills, Atlas, Leonard, Lakeville, Lake Orion and Auburn Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
